testcase.name: Order From Bite Me
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to Swiggy....................................................passed Then Enter delivery location as Indiranagar, Bengaluru......................passed Then Select first result which is Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India..passed And Click on Search.........................................................passed Then Search for Restaurant called “Bite Me” and Click on it.................passed When Restaurant loaded......................................................passed Then Click on Bite Me Restaurant............................................passed Then Add few items to the cart..............................................passed Then Add one more red velvet cupcake........................................passed Then click on Tiramisu cupcake..............................................passed Then click on plus to add more Tiramisu cupcake.............................passed Then click on add for Irish Coffee Cupcake..................................passed Then click on add for Choco Choco Cupcake...................................passed Then click on checkout......................................................passed Then verify item added in chechout page.....................................passed Then click on new swiggy....................................................passed Then pass phone number......................................................passed Then pass name..............................................................passed Then Enter email............................................................passed Then Enter password.........................................................passed Then click on CONTINUE......................................................passed But Error message at Email field ​“Email id already exists”​ and Capture screenshot.not executed Then Change Red Velvet cupcake quantity to One..............................not executed
